scripts.buildfirst: cd backend && npm install  && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: mv frontend/dist/files frontend/files && cd backend && npm install  && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ && mv frontend/files frontend/dist/files
scripts.buildW: move frontend/dist/files frontend/files && cd backend && npm install  && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ && move frontend/files frontend/dist/files
